original_title: Newsline with Deprose Muchena: Amnesty International highlights concerns regionally
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Watch a News 1st exclusive interview with Senior Director of Amnesty International Deprose Muchena.
Sri Lanka’s 17th Parliament Speaker Joseph Michael Perera, passes away
G.C.E. A/L paper marking delayed, O/L Exams to be held as planned.
Sri Lanka fined for slow over rate in 1st ODI against New Zealand
